```{r}
for(i in 1:9){
  x <- Glass[,i]
   hist(x,
       main=paste("Series Chart",i,": Box Plot of Chemical Elements",
          names(Glass)[i],"by Type of Glass"),
       xlab="Type of Glass",
       col = ("Dark Green"))
}
```
